name: Tow N Go
description:
Let’s hit the road and tow all the cars with the coolest truck!

Stop on the way and pick up the cars parked in the ‘No parking’ area. Collect as many as you can at a time; it'll be a trail of cars on your truck! Do you think it’s an easy job? Stop, look and tow it before it’s too late to go back!

Keep an eye out! Someone parked it outside the grocery shop, and it's no parking! How much does the red car cost? A whopping 2000$! Let’s get it in the truck and make loads of money today!

The more cars you collect in your truck, the richer you become. Be careful while towing cars, don't crash into trains or cars on the path.

Let's Tow N Go!

Features:
- Tow N Go cars with your truck
- Collect money and become rich
- Challenge yourself!
